biotools.summary: Optimal P-value Threshold Pedigree Disequilibrium Test is a family-based multi-SNP association test. A variable p-value threshold algorithm is used in the test to select an optimal subset of SNPs that has the strongest association signals.

bioschemas.name: OPTPDT
bioschemas.summary: Optimal P-value Threshold Pedigree Disequilibrium Test is a family-based multi-SNP association test. A variable p-value threshold algorithm is used in the test to select an optimal subset of SNPs that has the strongest association signals.
